content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: MHCAT
      operator: has_same_values
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0077
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: MHCAT should not group all records.  If no smaller categorization can
  be applied, then it is not necessary to include or populate this variable.
Outcome:
  Message: MHCAT is grouping all records into one generic group. If no smaller categorization
    can be applied, then it is not necessary to include or populate this variable.
  Output Variables:
    - MHCAT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0077
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: This categorization should not group all records (within
                  the MH Domain) into one generic group such as "Medical History"
                  or "General Medical History" because this is  redundant information
                  with the domain code. If no smaller categorization can be applied,
                  then it is not necessary to include or populate this variable.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Assumptions 3.a.1
                Section: 6.2.6
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - MH

json.Description: MHCAT should not group all records.  If no smaller categorization can be applied, then it is not necessary to include or populate this variable.

Outcome.Message: MHCAT is grouping all records into one generic group. If no smaller categorization can be applied, then it is not necessary to include or populate this variable.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: This categorization should not group all records (within the MH Domain) into one generic group such as "Medical History" or "General Medical History" because this is  redundant information with the domain code. If no smaller categorization can be applied, then it is not necessary to include or populate this variable.
